content.detailedDescription:
Omg omg!!!! 
i came here this evening to report what i saw in beverly hills this morning at 8:47am!!!
i watched this move from directionally south towards north for approx 1-2 minutes until it went beyond my view due to my workplace/building. i first noticed it at approximately 80 degrees above the horizon (when looking straight up into the sky) from a southern direction. i watched it move northward until approximately 60/65 degrees above the horizon.

the morning sun was low and with the "pineapple express dotted clouds" all over the sky above, i had looked up to marvel at them..... i then noticed what appeared to be a 'quite low-flying-what-appeared-to-be-a-silver-balloon-although-somewhat-deflated-in-the-middle' flying beneath the clouds. it was as shiny silver as silver could be!! 

i then realized that this was not a balloon.... for it was moving in a direct line from south towards north. i watched it under the clouds, moving through the clouds although slightly obscured by the little cottonpuffs at times.... and it was moving with purpose. it was no balloon. i watched it for perhaps 1-2 minutes move under and through the clouds until i could no longer see it (due to buildings). it did not change altitude, nor wobble as a balloon would. additionally, the puff clouds were moving easterly slowly but this was intent on navigating north, and it easity did so. this was no balloon albeit it sure initially appeared as one due to its low altitude. i'd have to say that its altitude was somewhere between a low-flying little plane and a high-flying news helicopter.

i'm a kid at heart and just love to look up and see the clouds.... this thing caught my eye and once i realized that it was 1) not a balloon, and 2) had no wings to fly, i realized that it was exactly the same thing i had seen back on jan 17-18 of this year and oct 6 of last year..... almost sort of a dumbell shape. this time however it was so low, that it tossed me for a loop and during my entire viewing: all i did was look for wings, and talk myself out of the 'balloon theory'. at some point however, i realized it to be what it was. i also realized it to be the same thing i've seen prior recently.... "that dumbell-shaped thing" only this time so close and low in altitude that it felt as though i could almost touch it this time around. my previous sightings had never been this low in altitude (low, but not skimming the land-kind-of-thing). although, this morning was early enough that with the low morning sun, this time all i saw was immense shiny reflectiveness. my oct viewing was the setting sun and the object did not appear as huge and bright (it was also much higher in the sky then). my jan viewing was basically 24 hrs long over my building and that time i saw colors rather than just a silver reflectiveness. perhaps that sighting was near the same altitude, but with the clear blue sky and lack of low sun reflecting silver, it was much harder to define in the sky above.

while i had no access to anything for 'picture' or 'video footage', if you look at case #54544 (yesterday march 9, 2014) which occurred in torrance, california...... that is exactly what i saw this morning. approx same height although perhaps lower, definitely same shape and high reflectiveness. thank you case #54544 for capturing what i could not this morning! this thing 'flew' without a care in the world this morning... it's as though it could care less who saw it...... or it figured that with all the cotton-ball-puff clouds in the sky, that no one could see it. sadly, it miscalculated the early morning directional sun.... and this puppy shone like a small hindenburg on a mission to go somewhere north; and it was not a balloon. 

soooo, yes virginia ---- even on your 4th sighting, your skin will tingle, your mouth will drop as you watch, and you'll wonder just where oh where is your coworker that you're waiting for so that finally someone else will see what you've been seeing a lot of recently!!!!!!!!

..... ahhh, perhaps next time virginia, perhaps next time.
content.summary: This puppy shone like a small hindenburg on a mission to go somewhere north; and it was not a balloon!!

content.detailedDescription:
The object was only viewed on friday, march 7, 2014 while looking at the stars from my home (backyard) in the west pensacola, fl area .. have checked on about the same times thru tonight, march 10, 2014 to see if the object may have reappeared (it has not).  the moon was slightly more than a quarter moon  when object was observed .. the object was illuminated by the moon light .. it did not move (no rotation or speed noticed).  was close to the moon, with no other obects, such as commercial aircraft, present (other than nearby stars). i can not say with any accuracy that the object was an ufo as some may decribe, but it was an object of extreme mass, and appeared to be contructed or composed of a non-reflective (not shiny) metallic type metal.  what the rest of the object looked like is unknown (not visible) but i can state that the part that was illuminated was dome shaped and of a light to medium gray color.  i did not see any movement, rotation or lights nor what would appear as windows/portals.

the observed object could very well have been a meteor (a large one at that).  
because mufon constantly monitors ufo activity, would be interested in learning if you had received similar reports about this object other than mine.
content.summary: Close to the moon .. no movement .. had shape and mass

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in my living room chair my wife was in kitchen i looked over to tell her something and saw very bright lights moving tward my window it was very low at first i thought police chopper but heard no noise at all so i walked outside to get a better look and it had changed direction i feel i could see the side of it i observerd 5 lights 3horazontal and on the back the light had a half moon shape  looked kinda like this - - -) best i can describe on computer this is the 1st time i have ever seen any thing like this and i and very much into astronomy i am always looking at the sky about 6 years ago i saw something that looked mike a big v in the sky but this was like nothing i have ever seen
content.summary: Looked like a car driving tward my window

content.detailedDescription:
1. standing on porch.
2. someone pointed it out, none of us could identify it.
3. a fireball, perhaps debris burning up, maybe?
4. i don't recall specifically the direction it went.
5. haven't seen anything i would consider a ufo before, thought it was neat.
6. eventually left sight.
content.summary: Orange-red, flickering, had a tail ... not a plane/helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
(the information presented here was collected during a phone call from above witness and is submitted by the utah assistant state director. investigation report will be filed by asd after this initial sighting report). 

witness was traveling south on i-15, returning home after a visit with her mother. during her drive home to salt lake city, she was talking on her cell phone with her aunt when she first noticed what she initially thought was airplane lights moving north parallel to the interstate. after about 5 minutes, the object became more visible as it slowly passed over her vehicle. there were two solid white lights that were on two of the triangle's points while a larger blue light that flickered intermittently was near the center of object. she guessed it was about football field size in length and 100 ft above her car when it passed over. she could then see what she called a "design" on the underneath.
content.summary: Large triangle object flew over my vehicle on i-15

content.detailedDescription: I was with my friend heading home from the movies, and when we reached the road he lived on we saw a strange triangular object with large circular lights on each point. it was just off the road and hovering over the trees. there was a house about 30 feet away from the craft.My friend who was driving stopped the car about 100 feet before the craft. we both got out of the vehicle to get a better look. we were both stunned. i proceeded around the front of the car to get a better look. then i decided to walk towards the craft. i'd say half way i turned around and asked my friend to turn the car off. at first he refused but gave in. i asked him if he could hear the noise the craft was making which sounded like a hum a transformer would make. i decide to get closer to the object i'd say i was ten feet away. i stood there and watched it hover over the trees for about 10 or so minutes. then i decided to grab some gravel and throw stones at it cause i felt threatened. as soon as i lifted my arm to throw the rocks the craft shut it lights off and very slowly turned to the left. the road was curving to the right and then straightened. after turning left it started fly down the road but never changing altitude until about 1/4 mile down the road it accelerated at such high speed almost a blink of an eye kind of speed and it was heading north at a 45 degree angle. no exhaust was left behind and it made no sound when it accelerated. changed my life and i never seen anything like it since and i was 16 teen at the time and nowi am 36.
content.summary: A black triangle with large circular lights on each point

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving from belfast where we went to do work on her grams home for the day. we were in my chevy silverado going route #3 west towards augusta when i noticed two square shaped  white halogen like lights above the tree top on the left side of the road within an 1/8th mile from us south west over saint george lake my wife said it must be a tower i said no it's not a tower like light pattern or red lights. i said it's not a plane or a helicopter because i know what those light patterns are i spent 8 years in the army with the calvary in texas and the 152 f/a from maine. the lights hovered just above the tree tops and switched directions north east to south west and kept elevating and descending. we watched it for a good 15 minutes as it pulsated two lights that were large on the ends and had smaller lights in between it looked like 5 or 6 of them but it also looked like the craft was spinning two gig lights on the end to one on the end with 5 or 6 smaller tailing. i could sort of make out the shape of the craft with the design of the lights it sort of looked like a whoopee pie. i asked my wife if she had a camera as she always carries one but on this occasion she did not. i tried following the craft but the speed was unreal i have never seen anything like it as it changed directions then i almost rear-ended someone while i was doing 80mph trying to watch the craft then i got caught up in traffic and totally lost it. we tried paying attention for it when we came into clearings but it was gone.
content.summary: My wife and i had seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was nearing the end of my 24-hr duty and wanted to take a photo shoot with the american flag as a back drop.  since no one else was available to take the photos i took multiple selfies in order to have a few available pictures to choose some. about 10 minutes later i then sat down to review the photos only to be surprised by the "guest" photo bombing my pictures.  i walked back outside to observe the sky and i did not see anything.  
it reminded me of an earlier incident during my duty.  about three hours earlier as i drove around performing security checks around 0330 hrs, i had noticed a red glowing orb in the post housing area. i was approximately 200 yards from it as it rose from the housing area, paused, then shot off at an unbelievable speed into the distant foothills disappearing from sight. i thought it could've been fireworks but i did not hear anything nor see anyone once i approached the area that i had speculated it rose from. at that time i thought perhaps it was fireworks and that the folks that fired it off must've ran off.  
after seeing the orb in my selfies, now i am almost certain what i had saw earlier was another orb.
content.summary: Apparent appearance obscured during photo shoot.

content.detailedDescription: It was a warm evening and just came home from church, my wife stayed for additional duty so i took off my dress shirt grab a cool one and sat on the patio facing ne so i could enjoy the trees and slight breeze when suddenly out of the corner of my eye i sensed movement. at first i thought these were beautiful golden yellow orbs were balloons floating toward me but instantly realized they were not as they were almost perfectly single file. i jumped up and stood next to the corner of my house next to a bunch of computer discs, an air foil that made flashes like mirrors. i counted them as they came 13 of them, the leader came so close i think i could have hit it with a rock when all of a sudden they must have finally sensed me they broke formation and headed south a perfect 90deg turn. i ran to get my old sony camera it only took a minute but by then they were white glowing dots in the sky. i felt cheated that i didn't get pictures of the beautiful golden yellow orbs, then as i stood there staring after i see more movement directly the east again! here came a massive orb like the sun i was stunned and then i see a tiny classic saucer shape hiding slightly behind it, it came to about 1/4 mile away and hovered, i was so shocked i forgot the camera,,,,,,,,,,then i done something i regret doing, verbally i said who are you friend or foe? then holding my hands out i asked do you want to be friends ? instantly i felt this searing pain in my solar plexus and upper stomach and i yelled ooooh  as i grabbed myself. instantly it/they moved south and to the west on other  side of my house and i ran  around and tooksome  pictures but they changed shape like  they were instant far from me,,,,,,,,,,two i took when close turned out blank.   i was  scarred  and felt sick, when my wife came  home i told her what happened. for 3 days i told no one for fear they brand me a teller of tales. finally i went to neighbors whos 2 little boys were kicking a socker ball around while their  mother watched, she heard or seen nothing my closest  neighbor said she seen or heard nothing but her dog and neighbors dogs barked for 1/2hr continuously, they didn't know why? i called air national 4 miles away and asked about radar check, they said their was no alert but requested a  report and i also sent a report to seattle to the ufo report center  there! i swear this is all true and i still suffer chest and stomach pain occasionally to this day.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Beside it.

content.detailedDescription:
It was my birthday, two friends and i walked onto the front porch to have a smoke. we were sober, and in good spirits. my friend spotted it first, between the bare tree branches behind my house; it was a flickering fireball that appeared to be travelling easterly toward us, but slowly banked to a continued southward direction. there are usually planes in the area, and the object seemed to be at the normal altitude for a plane, but we carefully observed that it did not have plane-identifying lights at all. all we could see of the object was its light, which was varied red-orange in color, with a fire-like glow, but no tail or smoke. 
we observed it steadily making its way to the south, neither gaining nor decreasing in speed or altitude for several minutes. i can't speak for my friends, but i was very pleased to be watching it, my first ufo sighting. when the object was very far to the southwest, it seemed to flicker and dim before quickly snuffing out. it is unclear whether the flickering was caused by the object itself, or from the atmospheric distance between it and our eyes. 
i felt no dread during this experience, except after we'd gone back inside to discuss it. my friend told me she'd thought it was a meteor at first, and the thought of that gave me a very uneasy feeling. i should note that it's not her first sighting, though it was her first night sighting. i've asked them to fill out their own forms, after just finding this website today. 

much love.
content.summary: Fireball ufo travelling south, with maintained speed and altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I joined my husband on our back stoop for a cigarette. i was standing in the garage and he was outside. he looked over toward the front of the house and noticed a strange light. he beckoned me to come outside and take a look as he had no idea what it was that he was looking at. the light was a dark orange color and flickered slightly like a candle. it moved slowly toward us. i told him to take a picture and as soon as he pulled out his phone, the light started moving the opposite direction. it never looped out to turn around, just started going backward. it was dark out so none of the pictures turned out, but we just watched it move away from us until we couldn't see it anymore. it was very strange, we were almost in awe just trying to figure out if it could be a plane or something else.
content.summary: Viewed orange light flickering like a candle moving slowly from north to south, then quickly changed direction back to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard having a cigarette and watching the sky lighten up from the sunrise, which was on the front side of my house which faces east.  i am always out there looking at the sky at all hours of the day and night, seeing the stars and looking at them through my binoculars has become something i really enjoy, i have also witnessed many many strange things , especially at night and it seems i am coming into another active period of strange sightings, but i will focus on this one first.  as i was looking south i noticed a vibrant bright, slightly yellowish light that sparkled like an enormous diamond.  it ws coming from the south west moving at probably 15 - 20 mph, straight toward the northeast, absolutely silent and  without any visible engine, wings, tail or nose, it resembled a tall narrow bell jar with a plate shaped bottom.  at that point it was about 1/4 mile from me and approximately 500 feet in the air.  as the object moved over the top of the house i ran through to the front to see if the rising sun would back light the object enough to view if it was an airplane or  helicopter, or something else recognizeable, but no,   i could also see through my binoculars that there was no visible structure to it, just pure light with a , plate shaped bottom, no dark center where one would think a cockpit might  be.....Exactly the same craft/object  i witnessed on september 12th and 14th of 2012.  the sighting on the 12th involved an airforce jet from davis monthan afb in south tucson, which is about 9 miles north of where i live.   as the object went over the houses it shifted slightly to the north-north east and i continued watching through the binoculars until it disappeared out of sight due to distance. i didn't have any unnatural feelings during this sighting, i was excited to see it return and i'll be watching to see if it comes around again!  i will also keep my camera handy for photographic proof.   i will submit another report on my previous sightings in 2012.  at the time i was afraid of getting a visit from someone from the airforce.
content.summary: Bright, lit from within with light rays emitting from all around, tall cylinder shape no appendages

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a flock of blackbirds flying south west at about 630pm near sunset at riveroad and 41 and intersecting my vision was a metallic sphere and i followed it visually about 20 seconds. its direction was constant and fast and silent with no lights traveling to the northwest. it appeared to be 10-20 ft in diameter.
content.summary: The speed was faster than a small plane.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Observed 80 to 100 orbs march 9, 2014 at 3:45 to 5:45 - 6 along with friends and family and a truly spectacular moment in history when you observe something as we did and to know that there is something more powerful than the human race and yesterday made me and whole bunch of people relize that and what we saw was an show put on by ufo's and it was spectacular in everyway possible. we also obsevered many others in tri patterns and in pairs some sole and tumbling and then suddenly stop why the other two kept going and as we were showing someone i turned and a fleet was making all kinds of patterns in the sky for severral minutes before they vanished except 10 - 15 that played for hours.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 80 to 100 orbs and tumbling ufo's for hours

content.detailedDescription:
my parents and i had just returned from getting ice cream cones at the nearest town. it had just gotten dark as it does in late august. it was about 8:50-8:55 pm. no outside light had been left on as i unlocked the door to go in when i heard the sound you hear when an airplane is falling to crash. then a short whispered boom. i grabbed my parents and told them to get outside as i felt something was happening. we got outdoors and i noticed the sky turning very bright from the west just over the ridge that was about 500 feet away. suddenly it came over the ridge and we were blasted with an intensely bright light. as we diverted our eyes, we could see everything in our yard and all around, same as daylight, even under the leaf laden trees in our yard. then we noticed we were in its shadow and looked up and saw a huge ship that extended over our yard, over the road and well into the pasture out back. it was a solid dark color with no windows or  features other than the shape of the ship. it had a stealth-like shape but seemed flatter and more expanded than the stealth planes. it was moving at a walking pace and made a slight humming noise. it literally looked as though it was just over the treetops and my mom screamed saying it was going to hit the church on the west side of our yard. it well cleared the church and as my view was now blocked from seeing it, i ran around the front of the church and watched as it cruised at the same pace over the neighbors and beyond the ridge that was about 2/10's of a mile away. years later, i asked my parents if they remembered what we did afterwards. none of us did. my mom said she supposed we went to bed, but, i find that hard to believe as the excitement of it all would have kept me up most of the night. i honestly don't remember what happened afterwards.
     many years later, i met a man that i started working with and one day we started talking about ufo's. he started telling me about a job he and his sister had worked at in a nearby city(45miles away)and that they would get home about 9 pm. long story short; he and his sister saw the same ufo drop out of the sky and they went to higher ground to see if they could get a better view and saw a very large ship drifting to the west with a powerful light on top beaming forward. this was the same night we saw our ufo only he was seeing it from 8 miles away. that was when i realized that from our point on the ground, it looked very close to us and later realized that it was actually much higher in the sky than we thought and that it was actually much bigger than i thought. much, much bigger.
      we discreetly asked some of the neighbors if they had seen anything unusual, but no one had indicated that any event took place. we kept this information to ourselves for many years for fear of being teased, so, it wasn't common knowledge that we saw anything.
      to this day, i can't understand why i don't remember what happened afterwards and also why none of us felt even the slightest bit of fear (other than my mom's concern for the church)...
content.summary: Craft stealth-like shape, barely humming noise, moved at walking pace, large, intensely bright light on top

content.detailedDescription: Lights hovering between one and two am staying 30 mins to hour and then going west
content.summary: Nite time potty with puppy looked up saw it watch it

content.detailedDescription: Person was abducted again. harmed with some ball substance in upper right lung. doctors cannot explain the solid ball substance. i myself took it upon myself to report the issue. mainly because he doesn't think mufon believed him i believe 10 years ago. the first time his abduction happened and he reported it his self. well folks. take this information and run with it any way you wish. but it's real. and obviously really happened. there is medical evidence that backs this up. both from in 2003 or 2004. ultra sound evidence. and now of course ultra sound and x ray evidence again. i just thought mufon might want to know of this issue. have a good day.
content.summary: Important! roger penny was abducted again

content.detailedDescription: I was out side my mothers house.Waiting for my wife to check on my parents cat because they were on vacation.When i noticed a light in the sky off to my right.This light was strange to me because it zoomed in and out.I did not know what it was... so i steped outside the car to get a better look.It went on for 5 minutes till my wife came outside and asked what was i looking at.I asked her to tell me what she sees with her own eyes. my wife explained exactly what i was looking at.I told the kids about it and said lets go home. as we drove home the light continue to zoom in and out till i lost sight of the light when we were almost home.
content.summary: Light in the sky that zoomed in and out.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of augast 13 2012 my girl friend and i were walking beside a lake in sudbury ontario and saw what we thought was a fire or fire ball on the far side of the lake. as we watched what we thought was a fire on the other side of the small lake ( 150 feet away or so), we noticed short and obese looking kids walking around the fire. my girl friend said they look like puffy kids or fat kids. i suggested it looked like the michelin man because of how the arms were extended out and puffy looking/short. approximately a minute or two later we noticed what we thought was a camera flash or an arc flash and the fiery sphere/ball lifted about 2 or 3 feet off the ground and turned into 2 firey balls. within a few seconds we watched as the one on the right slowly ascended into the sky on what looked like a set trajectory as it steadily ascended up and to the right in the sky until it was out of sight. immediately after the first one disappeared the second one ascended at the same trajectory almost exactly. after these two ufo's and entities were out of sight, i almost immediately said let's have a look at what's over there and see if we can find any evidence of the crafts/orbs. after some convincing my girlfriend agreed to go look with me,  however we weren't able to find anything as it was getting very dark and we weren't prepared with flash lights. so basically after a quick glance in the general area of the landing spot we decided to go home and come back in the day. so the next day i came back and looked during the day but had dificulty finding anything at all. this is where it really get's interesting/ weird. i returned the following evening to the shore line that i saw the orbs/crafts with a flash light and began a stake out of the area. wihtin minutes weird stuff started to happen i heard all kinds of strange banging in the woods behind the shoreline where i stood, and almost immediately after the banging i heard a huge splash in the water. this splash scared the hell out of me, it was very close to me, i was very scared and thought something shot a boulder in the water close to me. however upon closer examination, and after a short dash and regaining my senses as well as jolt of curiosity i decided to stay and find out what was going on. a minute or two later i spoted a long snake like creature with a big head and shiny glossy eyes. this creature was not like any snake i've ever seen and i quickly realized this creature was responsible for the loud splashes. i have never seen anything snake like cause such a loud splash, almost like a warning to get away from the area. i did become very freightened to be honest, however i couldn't help but probe this creature/serpent as i dubbed it. i began to signal this serpent with my flash light with 3 quick flashes at it, when i did this it would always come over to the shore within a few feet of me and swim/ snake by and create huge splashes. i got several good looks at it and can't relate this serpent to anything else i've ever seen. this thing could wip the water with it's tail or possibly a wing as i could not see what was causing the splash as it always happened so fast, this creature would do laps back and forth in the area that i saw the orbs/crafts landed, and it would splash around me if i tried to get close to the water or if i kept flashing my light at it, the serpent would splash and swim/snake side to side away. i noticed it never went under water it always had it's big gead out of the water, this thing had a python like head but it was no python, it was approximately 4 or 5 feet long and almost a foot thick looking at it's thickest/tallst part of its body. i saw all kinds of weird bumps and prehistoric looking features on it's body through the water, with my flash light shining on it. i watched this creature swim around for several nights as fall came too. it was very cold out in october and this serpent was still there to be found every night around 9 oclock it would come around, i could never see it during the day. now i live in northern canada/ ontario, we don't have predatory looking snakes like this, the biggest we have are small rattle snakes in parrysound/ french river ontario area. i have never spotted one myself, and any water snake i have ever seen looked nothing like this serpent/creature. i once shot small rocks at it and it was very distant after that, almost like it was intelligent and began to see me as a threat. i did try to snap photo's of this but it was too hard to gain any detail in the dark. i do swear this all to be true, i did not wish to name the lake as i do not want any harm to come to this serpent. i decided eventually to leave it alone, something told me not to speak of the event to anyone other than family. i am now coming forward with this event, in conclusion i did not see any other craft sightings in the days that followed the initial sighting, but did spot the serpent numerous times and it was bizarre. my girlfriend also came and saw it too, she can verify this story. i would also like to mention that no boats are aloud on this lake and it's essentially a safe haven for geese as their are no motor boats allowed on the lake. i would be willing to say which lake, just not on this public description.
content.summary: My girlfriend and i witnessed a fire like sphere on the edge of the lake/shore. we thought it was a fire but was ufo, saw "michelin" type "fat kids" walking around fire/ufo. it then split into 2 and made a bluish/white ark flash and ascended slowly upward

content.detailedDescription: Coming from a family event (approx. 5 miles away) going southbound on i-95 in lorton, virginia; i noticed three reddish-orange lights hovering in the sky. at first glance it didn't seem to be out of the ordinary, and with the area having high air traffic i almost disregarded it. but as i looked further, i could tell these were not stars due to the very bright nature, or aircraft due to it not having any of the characteristics of methodical flashing lights or consistent movement. the position of the lights in the sky was directly over the interstate, with two of the lights being level on each side of the highway and the third being slightly lower and on the left of the light on the left side of the highway. i then mention them to my girlfriend in the car, who had been driving. she said that they looked weird but didn't think its was odd. within the first couple of seconds of her looking at the lights a fourth one appeared in between the two that were positioned on the left side of the highway. at this point i became a little freaked out because lights just don't just appear in the sky and just stay there, and the light was the same color and had the same sort of vibrating/pulsating effect as the other three. the pulsating effect was weird because it wasn't a traditional flashing light where its off then on, but rather the lights was on and had a rapid dim and brighten. all four shared this same characteristic, so i assumed that they were the same things. when the fourth light appeared  its position was strange because it formed a small triangle. at this point i try to film the account on my iphone 5s but coincidentally i was out of storage and did not have space to record. soon after attempting to record it 2 of the lights that were on the left side of the highway disappeared. i can't recall how they went away, but no sort of movement was witnessed, just the lights appearing and then disappearing. all of this happened in the span of 5 minutes and about 3 miles all of which were southbound.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in northern virginia i-95 s

content.detailedDescription: Reptile like half circle staring at me eyes with slits in them glowing like
content.summary: Reptile like half circle staring at me eyes with slits in them glowing like

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)

About 2hours in the sky i was saw many ufo or orbs or white light balls, some of them was moving under the clouds and some above. over 1000+++ orbs lights or ufo i cant expain better cuz my english is poor level.But was something like this http://www.Mufoncms.Com/files/54548_submitter_file2__image.Jpg 
i was on my home and i had a good time with my dog.
my first notice was when i taked a look at the moon then i saw so many orbs or fireballs or ufo i dont know what was they.
all of those orbs was moving in one direction some of them was moving a faster. 
my feelings was in one word wow. i just wake my dad and he confused from what he saw...
after 2++ hours these orbs ufo or fireballs lost on the horizon.
ps i try with laser light in red color to give the a signal or whatever but without any respond..

my xperia mini cant rec them poor camera 5mp :(
content.summary: 2hours in the sky i was saw many ufo or orbs white light only some of them was under the clouds and some above. over 1000+++ orbs lights or ufo i cant expain better cuz my engilish is poor.

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my back yard and looked west about 9:00p.M. 3/9/2014. i noticed an odd looking star, then it started flashing different colors and darting around like no man-made craft could do. i came in, got my flashlight, got my wife to verify i wasn't crazy. she saw it too. a few minutes later another object came from west to east and stopped in the sky a little west of my front yard, we thought at first it was a plane until it stopped dead still. i started blinking my flashlight at it, it started blinking different colors at me. i moved my light in circular and back and forth motions and it started moving around very quickly, up and down, left and right, no plane or helicopter could do that. we played light tag for almost 3 hrs. an airplane came over from west to east and the object dimmed and moved to the west a pretty good bit. i also had the same result from 4 or 5 other star like lights. i could shine my light at them and they would dart back and forth and flash random colors, would get brighter then dimmer too. it was cool.I'll never doubt that we have company again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw an odd light moving erractic, i proceeded to shine a flashlight at it. it reacted and danced in the sky while changing colors.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching tv when i noticed a object flying through the air it made a sudden stop and then shinneded a very bright spot light on tbe ocean what seemed to be a way to open a door if you will. then all of a sudden it entered the ocean i could see a geen glow under the water for a vefy short amount of time. i then realized that aliens were living under our oceans. on another occassion at about midnight i  was walking back from my out house with my dog by myself all of a sudden a bright light lite the groud below me as if it was day time i looked down and my dog was looking up so i looked up and there was a very big round ufo above me about 50' and it glowed a clear pleasant light like a light bulb i watched as it moved slowly away from me and then all of a suddenly i woke up inside my house in my bed but my dog was outside and i would have brought her in the house. also i have no memory of anything after watching the ufo moving away.
content.summary: Observed a glowing object. shooting accros the sky then watched as it entered the ocean

content.detailedDescription: I was about 11-12 years old and standing alone on the sidewalk in front of my house. in the southern sky i saw two very quick blinks of light, it was sunny out and no clouds. after the 2 blinks of light a big colorful clam shape flash of multiple colors flashed originating from a small point in the southern sky. it disappeared then the whole sequence happened again 2 perhaps 3 more times. when i first noticed the first quick blinks of light i thought it might be lightning, but it was sunny and not a cloud in the sky. these lights would then shoot out in a clam shape or more like one of those hand fans that fold. during this time i heard no sounds of cars, or people, i was alone and had absolutely awareness except for what was taking place in the sky, i could not move, i was very frightened. i could not speak or scream for my parents, they were in the house playing cards with my aunt and uncle. i was absolutely paralyzed. after it was over i saw cigar shaped flashes of very bright solid white light going from west to east, it would disappear then reappear further west two more times then it reappeared once again this time it came from the west and was longer. and no it was not the northern lights.
content.summary: Flashing light originating from a small point and shooting out into a clam shape of different colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: Gentlemen, please check youtube " la belle nouvelle la plaine". at the 10:22 mark please observe the descending, glowing, object in the picture. i am pretty sure it landed, and this is the second one i have encountered in my life. i would like to attempt to recover it as i have spent a lifetime doing research at what this could be. there is a whole lot more i may offer by way of insight into my research.....Things very difficult to believe and accept. i am convinced this is not the work of any government per se. i am tired of being called crazy- i need your help. at st john's , i majored at physics and i am also a pilot with an associate degree at aerospace. i leaned at ethics that a revelation can not be kept internally and must be shared outwardly. i have finally found proof of what i had been trying to say to others since 1966.I promise you will not regret offering me your support , if only for the sake of the research discoveries i have managed over the years. i am ready to share.
content.summary: Proof of ufo observation made in 1966

content.detailedDescription: Driving on kaloli ave ocean bound with my friend in passenger seat, noticed objects flying in zig zag formation all orange in color, i pulled onto 12 th ave to the right or south east i stopped and turned off the engine and the lights of my jeep, me and my friend both jumped out of the jeep,and observed the objects fly in a changing formation in south west direction, i took 4 pictures of the objects with my i phone, my friend got alarmed and asked me not to take pictures of the objects he thought that they changed direction toward us, at this point the object flew behind the clouds , a home owner came out and asked us what was going on at that point another object flew from the direction of the ocean, it followed the other objects , the homeowner saw the last object, we drove home and that is when i looked at the pictures on my i phone , i was able to enlarge the pictures and to my amazement i saw a structured object of unknown origin like nothing i've ever seen ,i texted my wife the photos , she transferred the picture to her i pad , the pictures we're enlarged even more and we could see it was nothing that we could recognize as any known aircraft.
content.summary: Observed 5-6 objects flying in formation followed by lone object all orange color

content.detailedDescription: During my service in the u.S. navy i witnessed a strange unexplainable event while in transit back to our home port of san diego from rimpac 2010 multi national naval exercises.  course and speed was roughly 010 true @15 kits. the date was approximately 8/4/2010 time about 2215. i had just finished my watch in sonar control and went to the smoke deck on our starboard quarter (aka starboard break). i was not alone, however, i do not remember how many people or who was there that also witnessed the event. i saw a medium sized ball of light about 10 or 20 feet above water approximately 3kyds away almost as soon as i got there. initially i thought it was another ship that was also in transit and continued to observe it because to my knowledge we were alone in transit on our pim. (strike group commander set course and speed). it was mirroring our course and speed almost exactly with no discernable difference to our own for a period of about 15 minutes. the ball then traveled very rapidly from a forward position relative to my ship to aft then changed elevation and rose vertically nearly instantly to an elevation of about 200 feet or so from my perspective. it then appeared to mirror our course and speed from that elevation and follow us. startled and perplexed i put out my cigarette and went directly to the cic (combat information center) to report what i had seen to the cic watch officer and radar operators. i told the cicwo my findings and was brushed off. i then went to the sps-49 radar operator and he had apparently had overheard my story. the petty officer on watch proceeded to show me that he had contact on the surface and air search radar that corresponded to what i had witnessed.  he also told me that same chain of events has been reported 3 other times by other individuals and had been occurring since our transit had begun 2 days prior. i do not recall if the incidents had been logged or not in the cic watch contact log. i seem to recall being told by this petty officer that they were instructed to maintain contact and observe its movements but dont bother logging it as it didn't appear hostile or of any interest. i was also told by him that the past 2 nights they had lost contact due to extreme elevation at about the same time each night. a few hours before dawn. oddly enough during the actual rimpac exercises my ship as well as every other ship in our strike group experienced strange connectivity and communication issues. an investigation was launched by the strike group commander under the premise that there was suspected probe initiated by the chinese on our entire strike group.  i later discovered that the comms and systems phenomenon the ships experienced had no explainable origin and no evidence of an attack from a foreign nation was detected.
content.summary: Us navy sailor witnessed ball of light mirroring ships course/ speed then ascended rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
as a 13 year old boy i was working on the grother ranch approiximately 10 15 miles west of fairfield calif. between apricot and peach picking there is about a period of a week, i was staying at the ranch at my uncles work shack, in the evenings i would go out and look at sky before it go really dark, i had an 16 ft ladder on the side of a building i would look from, it was almost 9 9:30  when i noticed the object in the nw sky, the shape and colors got my attention, the purplish beam coming from back was also unusal,  following the object about 5 miles back was a flight of f86 jets coming from travis afb, i am familiar with this because  air force planes were an interest then, i am also retired af now, the planes never got close and the object continued to the nw over the pacific as far as i can tell, this has always been with me and i can not forget it, i drew a pictue of it then and over the years i have redrawn it several time, i have had other experiences with ufo material over the year but i am still afraid to disclose it yet , i.E project bluebbok is more than just ufo report.


                                         samuel head
content.summary: Oval/teardrop/ red/green/ interior, crossshatched. put  out steady beam from tail in kind of purple color

content.detailedDescription:
At the age of 12 in 1967 my teenage brother, step uncle, and step father were traveling on a narrow gravel road from the step uncle's home to a small store approx. 4 miles from his home.  we were approx. 1 & 1/2 mile from his home driving through a heavily wooded section of the road when we all saw a large object crossing the road at tree top height.  the objects total length was obscured by the trees on both sides of the road but was passing directly over our path and only yards ahead of us.  the object was gray in color and had windows through which we could see blue tinted light. the object made no sound of anykind and was moving at a very slow speed from our right to left.  the object was moving to slow for any object to stay airborne and was perfectly horizontal at tree top level. as the car passed directly under the object all conversation had ceased and no one spoke for several seconds until one of us (not sure who spoke first) asked what was that.  there still was no answer or conversation for several seconds until someone else acknowledged they had also seen the object.  then there was a couple minutes of conversation in which we stated our amazement at the sighting and all described the object with no difference of opinion as to its look, speed, direction, or height.

on the way back we briefly discussed the chance (fear in my case at least) of seeing the object again, but we did not.  my step uncle and his family lived in the same home until his death two years ago.  i never discussed the sighting with him or my brother who died in 1986 after that night.  my step father and i have only recently discussed the sighting again.  i have brought the subject up of what we saw 46 years ago to him and we still have identical memories of the happenings of the eveving prior to, during, and after the sighting.  we agreed that although the four of us had an identical experience it has been a subject that none of us were willing to openly discuss even with each other.  i only recently found out from my mother that my step father and his uncle described the sighting with their wives upon our return.

i feel blessed to have made the sighting.  i know to be the truth what most doubt.  i do not know where the object originated from or who was guiding it but i have seen what few will ever witness.
content.summary: Large object passed directly over car.  object was moving very slow at tree top height.    very visible shape and lights at windows.
